pageContent: When patients survive cancer, they eventually come back to their primary care physicians. This group has special needs, including surveillance for recurrent and new cancer, health promotion, and interventions to mitigate the lingering effects of the cancer and the adverse effects of its treatment.

metaData.source:
Sexual dysfunction and spousal communication in couples coping with prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/19061199/
